responses.title: Whatever they brought, it won't be enough.
If they want war, then we shall give it to them!
First blood for the Bronze Legion!
They'll never know what hit them.
Let's see what you're made of!
Don't you turn your back on me!
Time to match steel for steel!
I will tear you from your saddle!
What happened to one on one?
When the time is right, we will strike!
This day is not yet won!
You should've stopped when you lost the advantage.
Here's a blade in your eye!
The odds were against you. You just didn't know it.
Crawl back to your ditch, you filth!
I wanted to hear you beg!
And you call yourself an admiral.
I could best you with my eyes closed.
So ends the Scourge of the Plains.
Some general you turned out to be!
Curiosity got the better of you, Rubick!
You call those things an army, Chen?
I'm no stranger to the art of war, Dark Seer.
So much for the house of Avernus.
Only a coward fights with mines.
Never trust a--what are you anyway?
Abyssal filth. Huh. This alliance will be short.
Just save some for me, Axe.
You came to a battle wearing that?!
Alright Pudge, I'll slay em, you fillet em.
Come Azwraith--you and I both know peace is only won through action.
Come Centaur! Crush them beneath your hooves!
Lina, if our enemies must burn, they will burn.
Rubick, have you come to study or to fight?
Make them fear the hammer, Omniknight.
Send them down the paths of penitence, Chen.
Come Dark Seer. With sound strategy, we will prevail.
Are you sure you have the stomach for this, Enchantress?
Duels or brawls, it's all the same on the battlefield Tusk.
Bring forth the tempest, Arc Warden.
Auroth, let us turn their strength against them!
Pull it together Timbersaw. I won't have cowards in my army.
I do not take defeat lightly.
If I cannot outsmart them, I will outfight them.
If I cannot outfight them, I will outsmart them.
I underestimated them. It will not happen again.
I crossed the world to win this day. I will not fail now.
I am not so easily put down.
Retreat? Hah! Never heard of it.
If that's the kind of fight they want, then I will give it to them!
The enemy will be destroyed, no matter the cost!
Time to turn the tides of war!
This blade reeks of the abyss!
It's the smells of battle that stay with you long after they've ended. In Stonehall it was blood and sulfur, smoke, and rot and fear...
You won't win the war by dying for your Ancient. You'll win by making the other dumb, unfed bastard die for theirs!
A good strategist always keeps something in reserve.
Now this was worth fighting for!

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: Our enemy is crushed and our victory assured. Strategically, this one's in the bag!
The battle is ours! Victory is assured! This one is in the bag!
A true leader accepts responsibility for failure.
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha!
Ah ha ha ha ha ha ha!
